short.ar: العب لعبة راجدول هيت مباشرة على متصفح كروم™! نسخة تعمل بدون إنترنت ومنبثقة، لا يتطلب اتصال بالإنترنت!
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Now you can play the Ragdoll Hit game! Enjoy it offline and in a popup version without needing an internet connection!
short.de: Spiele Ragdoll Hit jetzt direkt im Chrome™-Browser! Offline- und Popup-Version, keine Internetverbindung erforderlich!
short.es: ¡Ahora puedes jugar a Ragdoll Hit directamente en el navegador Chrome™! ¡Versión sin conexión y emergente, no requiere Internet!
short.fr: Jouez maintenant à Ragdoll Hit directement sur le navigateur Chrome™ ! Version hors ligne et popup, aucune connexion Internet…
short.it: Ora puoi giocare a Ragdoll Hit direttamente sul browser Chrome™! Versione offline e popup, non richiede connessione Internet!
short.ja: Chrome™ブラウザで直接ラグドールヒットゲームがプレイできるようになりました！オフラインとポップアップバージョンで、インターネット接続は不要です！
short.ko: 이제 Chrome™ 브라우저에서 직접 래그돌 히트를 플레이할 수 있습니다! 인터넷 연결 없이 오프라인과 팝업 버전으로 즐기세요!
short.pt_BR: Agora você pode jogar Ragdoll Hit diretamente no navegador Chrome™! Versão offline e popup, sem necessidade de internet!
short.ru: Теперь вы можете играть в Ragdoll Hit прямо в браузере Chrome™! Оффлайн и всплывающая версия, не требует подключения к интернету!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Ragdoll Hit - Offline Physics Game

Experience the addictive physics-based gameplay of Ragdoll Hit anytime, anywhere with our Chrome extension! Now you can enjoy this entertaining game directly in your browser, even without an internet connection.

## Features:
- Play in popup mode for quick and convenient access
- Fully playable offline - perfect for travel or when internet is unavailable
- Seamless physics-based gameplay
- Quick loading and smooth performance
- Zero ads or interruptions

## How to Install:
1. Visit the Chrome Web Store
2. Search for "Ragdoll Hit" or use our direct extension link
3. Click the "Add to Chrome" button
4. Confirm the installation when prompted
5. Look for the Ragdoll Hit icon in your Chrome toolbar

## How to Play:
- Click the Ragdoll Hit icon in your Chrome toolbar to launch the game
- The game will open in a popup window
- Start playing immediately - no login or setup required

For more information, updates, and the full online version of the game, visit our official website at https://ragdollhit.app/

Need help or have questions? Contact us through our website or leave a review on the Chrome Web Store.

Enjoy endless hours of physics-based fun with Ragdoll Hit - now available offline through your Chrome browser!

---

Privacy Note: This extension runs completely offline and doesn't collect any personal data. Your gaming experience remains private and secure.
